title: World End Fairytale
sinopse:
Death, Enchantments, Fairies, Spirits. All these elements twist amongst themselves to offer a mysterious World End Fairytale for us. Join Koroku Morisaki as he unravels the truth that lies behind the conscience of several other characters with promising roles.

Included one-shots:
Volume 4: Crossbone Tanteidan Bangai-hen, Batorias no Kiba (Batorias: The Hound)
